title: I can't log into support.
body: I can't log in to the support page. It keeps telling me an error occurred and brings me back to the log in page. Where it errors out again after trying to log in.

replies.body: Hmmm strange, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or possibly using a different browser to see if that lets you in. If it doesn't and you were trying to submit a ticket, feel free to email us at support@riotgames.com!
